p: Beta-amyloid-induced neurotoxicity was also prevented by an aqueous extract of Morus nigra ‘Chiang Mai’ [ 14]. High amounts of cyanidin, keracyanin, and kuromanin as anthocyanidin and anthocyanins were found in the extract. M. nigra promoted neurite outgrowth and improved locomotory coordination of Drosophila co-expressing human amyloid precursor protein and BACE-1 specifically in the brain.
